snippet: The last newscast was Friday and “Chasing New Jersey,” a newsmagazine-style program, will begin on Monday night.
abstract: New Jersey-based television station WWOR will replace 10 PM half-hour news program with youthful newsmagazine called Chasing New Jersey; shift has implications for station's complex regulatory status, under which it was given public airwaves license with caveat that it pay particular attention to state's northern area.
lead_paragraph: The last newscast was Friday and “Chasing New Jersey,” a newsmagazine-style program, will begin on Monday night.

headline.main: WWOR-TV in New Jersey Replaces Nightly News
headline.print_headline: WWOR-TV In New Jersey Replaces Nightly News
